name: Food Fight (itch) (Three Flags Games)
description:
Welcome to Food Fight!

You and your opponent are engaged in the ancient art of food fighting.

Pick a card and pick a player. Imagine your player is on the space in the middle of the card; you can move to the squares in blue (as long as they're on the board and do not contain one of your players).

If you land on your enemy his or her piece is removed from play. (Yes!) In the unlikely event you have no valid moves for any of your players, please click 'pass' (otherwise you must play).

After you play, you will exchange the card you've played with the "swap card" (which means your sworn enemy will get to use that card later). Think carefully!

Two ways to win: (i) capture your enemy's leader (the one wearing a crown); or (ii) move your leader onto your enemy's base.

Good luck! 🍀

* * *

Food Fight is built using the LÖVE2d framework.
It is inspired by the game Onitama.
All emojis designed by OpenMoji – the open-source emoji and icon project. License: CC BY-SA 4.0.
